name: CyberClub-2077
developer: Dalian Magical Storm Network Technology Co. Ltd.
publisher: Dalian Magical Storm Network Technology Co. Ltd.
description: Cyber Club - 2077 is a Music VR Game，In the game, You will play a robot DJ Eos who is a graceful beauty DJ, she is one of virtual world service program to generate the personification of service robots, should not have feelings.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win7 SP1或者更高 Processor: CPU：Intel Core i5-4590或AMD FX 8350以上 Memory: 4096 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970或AMD Radeon R9 290以上 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4096 MB available space
